DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Utapine vs. Seroquel Patients With Bipolar Mania
DOC.detailed_description: Utapine Serquel belong anti-bipolar medication family , approve DOH ( Department Health , Taiwan ) , ingredient different manufacture . From clinical trial report , excellent effectiveness safety . The goal research evaluate safety well effectiveness Utapine Seroquel bipolar I disorder patient different ingredient different manufacture .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female age 1865 year diagnosis bipolar I disorder include DSMIV criterion make least one manic mixepisode record study entry . 2 . Having minimum score 20 Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) , plus score least 4 two core YMRS item Irritability , Speech , Content , Disruptive/Aggressive Behavior . 3 . At least 4 Severity Illness item Clinical Global ImpressionsNBipolar ( CGINBP ) assessment tool . 4 . Patient good compliance study medicine adherence study protocol . 1 . Had receive treatment clozapine within 28 day start trial . 2 . Had hospitalise 3 week longer index manic episode . 3 . DSMIV criterion rapid cycle current mixed episode . 4 . Intolerance lack response quetiapine clozapine trial diagnose investigator . 5 . Neurodegenerative disease eg : Parkinson desease、Huntington disease、Pick 's disease . 6 . Medicine drug change mental condition judge investigator . 7 . EKG abnormality 8 . Drug alcohol abuser
